text: Lotzwil is a municipality in the administrative district of Oberaargau in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. ==Gallery== File:2012-03-01-Supra Argovio (Foto Dietrich Michael Weidmann) 442.JPG|Lotzwil File:2012-03-01-Supra Argovio (Foto Dietrich Michael Weidmann) 425.JPG|Church of Lotzwil ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Website Category:Municipalities in Oberaargau
